description: A Kappa Youkai in the Nura clan whose domain is the fear of water and one of Rikuo`s demon guardians, he loves cucumbers. He fights extremely well near water and fights in a ninja suit. As part of Rikuo`s new "Hyakki Yakou", he is traveling to Kyoto. He appears to save Kubinashi and Kejourou.
name: Kappa
